name: Ace Combat: Thunderbolt
description:
Ace Combat: Thunderbolt is a hack of the BOLT RPG Engine by Ajey Pandey, emulating the atmosphere and story beats of the Ace Combat arcade jet-fighter video game series—that is, a series of anime dramas about ace pilots told through melodramatic cutscenes and snappy in-flight radio transmissions.

This short game features snappy combat mechanics based on the BOLT RPG Engine by Ajey Pandey, a preliminary set of planes and special weapons, and a framework for telling your own stories in the style of Ace Combat!

Ace Combat is the property of Bandai Namco Entertainment.

The BOLT RPG Engine was written by Ajey Pandey.
